title: Workshop on Inquiry and Collaboration-Based Science Learning Environment Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Scientific Concepts and Fundamental Digital Device Usage Skills
context.additional_context: Course for general citizens to strengthen elementary science education capabilities. Provides experience in designing inquiry- and collaboration-based learning activities for real-life problem-solving

learning_goals: Learners can explain the design principles of activities based on the scientific inquiry process.
Learners can design blended learning environments (digital/face-to-face) that promote collaborative learning.
Learners can measure the effectiveness of science learning activities using assessment rubrics.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
